p: Two blind researchers (EAC and GM) performed data extraction. In order to address the objectives of the review, the following information was extracted from the included papers: first author name, year and country of publication, analyzed period, study design, study sample (number, age, and gender), treatment provided, comparator group (e.g., placebo, active), study measure and outcomes. Reviewers extracted data independently from each relevant study and data was checked by all reviewers in case of discrepancies.
